function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Local barriers to ventilation due to partitions or drawn curtains","Impact":"Reduction in ventilation effectiveness, leading to increased risk of airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Use of secondary or auxiliary measures to achieve requisite ventilation effectiveness","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters","People":"Occupants, healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Facility managers, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Limitations in increasing ventilation rates during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Inability to adequately control airborne pathogen concentration, leading to increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Upgrading and retrofitting HVAC systems, implementing portable air purifiers","Technologies":"Portable air purifiers, HVAC system upgrades","People":"Healthcare administrators, building engineers, facility managers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, building management"}]}
